      • ingestXmlFromResourceAndWait

        public static String ingestXmlFromResourceAndWait(String resourceName)
                                           throws IOException
        Ingests an xml resource by name. Does not return until resource has been verified to be in the catalog
        Parameters:
        resourceName - - The relative path of the resource file
        Returns:
        metacard id
        Throws:
        IOException

      • doesMetacardExist

        public static boolean doesMetacardExist(String id)
        Does a wildcard search and verifies that one of the results is a metacard with the given id. This doesn't query directly on the metacard id because that query can return the metacard before it has been committed to the catalog. Metacards that have not been committed to the catalog will not be returned in queries unless that query is a metacard id query.
        Parameters:
        id - The metacard id to look up
        Returns:
        returns true if the metacard is in the catalog, false otherwise.
